output: assert n * (2 * n * n - 3 * n + 1) == 2 * n * n * n - 3 * n * n + n;
assert power(base, exp) == base * power(base, exp - 1);
assert forall j: nat :: j < n ==> P(j);
assert reverseHelper(reverseHelper(Nil, acc), Nil) == reverseHelper(acc, Nil);
assert insertAt(Nil, x, pos) == Cons(x, Nil);
assert seq(|xs|, i requires 0 <= i < |xs| => c * xs[i]) == [];
assert scaled_xs == [c * xs[0]] + seq(|xs[1..]|, i requires 0 <= i < |xs[1..]| => c * xs[1..][i]);
assert Power(base, exp1 + exp2) == base * Power(base, exp1 - 1 + exp2);
assert Power(base, exp1) == base * Power(base, exp1 - 1);
assert sumToN(n) == (2 * n + n * n - n) / 2;
assert fact(k) * fact(n - k) == fact(n - k) * fact(k);
assert multiset(evens + odds) == multiset([s[0]] + evens' + odds');
assert multiset([s[0]] + evens' + odds') == multiset{s[0]} + multiset(evens' + odds');
assert multiset(evens' + [s[0]] + odds') == multiset{s[0]} + multiset(evens' + odds');
assert repeat(x, n)[i] == repeat(x, n - 1)[i - 1] == x;
assert x in l <==> x in l[1..];
assert x in l[1..] <==> x in reverse(l[1..]);
assert x in reverse(l[1..]) ==> x in reverse(l[1..]) + [l[0]];
assert decode([RLE(1, s[0])]) == repeatChar(1, s[0]) == [s[0]] == s;
